title: Data Collection Exercise
text: Note various macros within vignette section metadata block . required order instruct R build vignette. Note change title field \VignetteIndexEntry match title vignette.

title: Data Collection Exercise
text: html_vignette template includes basic CSS theme. override theme can specify CSS document metadata follows:

title: Data Collection Exercise
text: figure sizes customised can easily put two images side--side.  can enable figure captions fig_caption: yes YAML: can use chunk option fig.cap = "figure caption." knitr.
code: plot(1:10) plot(10:1) output:   rmarkdown::html_vignette:     fig_caption: yes

title: Data Collection Exercise
text: can write math expressions, e.g. \(Y = X\beta + \epsilon\), footnotes1, tables, e.g. using knitr::kable(). Also quote using >: “gives [code] safety [code] speed deserves neither.” (via)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hansen HH (2023). pokemon.ecology: Package introduce ecological methods pokemon go. R package version 0.1.0, https://henryhansen.github.io/pokemon_ecology/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pokemon.ecology: Package to introduce ecological methods with pokemon go},   author = {Henry H. Hansen},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://henryhansen.github.io/pokemon_ecology/}, }

title: Pokedex Simulator -Samples random pokemon — pokedex.sim
text: n number pokemon return replace controls whether sample replacement gen controls generation pokemon sample , default 1st gen prob optional parameter controls probability sampling see sample()

text: Pokemon Population Sampler - Samples specified pokemon traits

title: Pokemon Population Sampler - Samples specified pokemon and traits — pokemon.pop.sim
Pokemon Population Sampler - Samples specified pokemon and traits — pokemon.pop.sim
text: pokemon name pokemon title case n number pokemon return traits column name pokedex describing pokemon traits vary controls whether vary numerical trait values sd optional parameter influence much variation add
